author: pauld.9606
content: <@!636680106630316033>, good point, there may be code deduplication opportunities, even for code chunks.

author: pauld.9606
content: Feel free to modify the current witness spec,  maybe by overhauling the contract account field `<Bytecode>` or by adding a new top-level section for code deduplication.

author: pauld.9606
content:
Some concerns. Code deduplication
 - complicates canonicalness checks (what is canonical code deduplication?),
 - increases witness building cost, which grows as you have more code to check for deduplication,
 - is not free (there is overhead to encode that there is duplication),
 - may not have significant savings, especially if there is regenesis.
